Package net.mtrop.doom

package net.mtrop.doom
Contains the base structural abstracts for this library.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    net.mtrop.doom.bsp
    Contains binary space partitioning data structures.
    net.mtrop.doom.demo
    Contains classes related to Demos.
    net.mtrop.doom.exception
    All exceptions specific to this library are contained here.
    net.mtrop.doom.graphics
    Contains abstracts and implementations of graphic types.
    net.mtrop.doom.map
    Contains abstracts and implementations of map object types.
    net.mtrop.doom.object
    Contains object interfaces for most data.
    net.mtrop.doom.sound
    Contains classes relevant to sound information.
    net.mtrop.doom.struct
    Additional helper data structures.
    net.mtrop.doom.texture
    Texture data and similar structures.
    net.mtrop.doom.util
    Contains utility classes.
  • Class
    Description
    DoomPK3
    Doom PK3 file.
    Wad
    Base interface for all WAD file type implementations for reading and writing to WAD structures, either in memory or on disk.
    Wad.Type
    Internal WAD type.
    WadBuffer
    An implementation of Wad where any and all WAD information is manipulated in memory.
    WadEntry
    Abstraction of a single entry from a WAD.
    WadFile
    The class that reads WadFile information and provides random access to Wad files.
    WadMap
    This is just a basic mapping of WAD entries to a file.
